text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
All right! Make sure you keep your eyes<n>on me,
Trainer. In this race, I'll—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey! Looks like we're facin' off again this<n>year.
Are you ready to eat my dust?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Hm... I've got no idea what you're<n>yammerin'
about, Ama.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Last year I told you you were<n>gonna eat my
dust, so I used that as a<n>springboard—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You should know me well enough by<n>now. If it's a
fight with me you wish for...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hazlo en la pista, no con tus palabras.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Entonces vamos—tú y yo. En el Arima<n>Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Je... Tienes una mirada bastante<n>en tus ojos.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun is staring at Triple<n>Crown
champion Narita Brian and the<n>"Queen of the
Amazons" Hishi Amazon.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ¡Lo siento, Entrenador! ¡Me distraje un poco ahí!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey, cut it out! You can't say that! I'm<n>not gonna
lose!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
You're not allowed to look at anyone<n>but me
during the race! Got it?
